author: Anonymous Calc
title: Maze problem - right and down
question:
After reading the question @976 I wondered if we could treat the maze, where we can only go right or down, as a Binary tree rather than an arbitrary-arity tree? 
I tried to solve it using the binary tree template, but didn't make it run (unfortunately, it doesn't mean that it is impossible)
instructor_answer: Yes, that could be a binary tree.  But for the general maze a position has [0, 4] possible next positions, so we chose to use a genrec arb-tree approach from the beginning.
